p: The number of patients starting each cycle was: glasdegib induction, n = 69 (100.0%); re‐induction cycle 2, n = 14 (20.3%); consolidation, n = 26 (37.7%); and maintenance, n = 15 (21.7%). Of the 15 patients who received at least 1 cycle of maintenance therapy, 6 completed 6 cycles, 6 discontinued due to cytogenetic or morphological relapse, 2 discontinued due to AEs (grade 1‐2 nausea/diarrhea; grade 3 muscle spasms) and one patient refused further treatment after receiving 11 cycles of maintenance. Following discontinuation of the study treatment, 72.5% ( n = 50) of patients received follow‐up systemic therapies, with the majority of patients ( n = 39) receiving chemotherapy (Supporting Information Table S2).
